Name: Boudica Faeborn
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Llafn Chwedl.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

Friendly CELTIC FAEBORN CASTER Formation within 6" of this model attempts to cast a Magic Spell, that Formation may re-roll a single dice used to cast that Magic Spell. In addition, each time a friendly CELTIC FAEBORN Formation within 6" of this model successfully casts a Magic Spell, add 1 to that Formations Will Characteristic until the end of the Round.

Spells.Name: Trust In The Fae (35)
Spells.Effect: All friendly CELTIC FAEBORN Formations within 9" of this model add 2 to their Will Characteristic until the end of the Round. In addition, all friendly CELTIC FAEBORN within 9" of this model may immediately move 3".

Spells.Name: Mindrazor (35)
Spells.Effect: Until the end of the Round, all CELTIC FAEBORN units within 9" of this model add 1 to wound rolls and improve the Rend Characteristic of weapons they are equipped with by 2.

Spells.Name: Blessing of the Fae Courts (35)
Spells.Effect: All friendly non-LEGENDARY FAE Formations within 9" of this model improve their Armour Save Characteristic by 2 until the end of the Round.
